overall.description: True if two arrays have the same shape and elements, False otherwise.

equal_nan.description: Whether to compare NaN’s as equal. If the dtype of a1 and a2 is complex, values will be considered equal if either the real or the imaginary component of a given value is nan.  New in version 1.19.0.

b.description: Returns True if the arrays are equal.

note: When equal_nan is True, complex values with nan components are considered equal if either the real or the imaginary components are nan. '
